JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description     Responsibilities     Deliver specific allocated requirements as part of a wider deliverable, including input into designs     Focus on coding and unit testing of changes to the product     Analyse and implement the requirements given to the team     Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions     Complete work items as part of a formal software development lifecycle     Deliver software to high quality and within agreed timescales     Skills     NodeJS, SQL Server, HTML 5, WPF, AWS, Web development, C# .Net Auth, REST API, Redux, ReactJS, GraphiQL, Javascript, XML, NodeJS, JSON, CSS and SQL server     In-depth knowledge of C# and .NET     Strong understanding of OOPs design, design patterns and programming skills     Experience with third-party libraries and APIs     Thorough understanding of SOLID architecture principles, dependency injection, MVC and MVVM     Ability to perform in a team environment     Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude     Stay up to date with new technology trends.
